name: Metafilter Minimal Green & Gray
description:
Love the site, hate the style. I based this off of two other styles I found here, Metafilter Baby Blue and Metafilter Just the Story. It could probably use improvement, but it's working well for me. 

Much more readable, removes the ads (I'd prefer to leave them in to support the site, but the iframes carry the old styling).
